Name: Viral Firar
About the game: Can you save our heroes from the virtual world? - Skill based arcade runner - Collect and Upgrade 5 Different Characters - Unique attack and jump abilities - Cute pixel art and music Viral Virar is an arcade running game. Try to reach the longest distance using the features of different characters, earn more with each run and improve your characters. There are very few people who can take the gold medal, track is deadly, how far can you go? Choose your runner; PintiPanda, Melodi, Dumbledoge, Dora and Togi. Upgrade them to run even farther!
